AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Details required by condition 3 (Travel Plan), 4 (Delivery and Service Management Plan), 6 (Cycle parking) and 8 (D1 Refuse facilities) of Planning Permission 19/02913/FUL (Change of use from scout hall (Class D2) to scout hall (Class D2) and childrens day nursery (Class D1).)
decision_conditions: That the applicant is informed that the submitted details are acceptable and Conditions 3, 4, 6 and 8 are hereby fully discharged.

For the avoidance of doubt, please confirm the description ''Demolition of the garage and erection of  two storey side extension. Hip to gable roof extension with rear dormer and installation of 3nos front roof lights to facilitate loft conversion. Green roof over the existing single storey rear extension. Installation of solar panels in main roof.''
